recipes.title: Spaghetti Bolognese
recipes.description: A classic Italian pasta dish with a rich meat sauce.
steps: Boil water and cook spaghetti until al dente.
Sauté onions and garlic in olive oil until translucent.
Add ground beef and cook until browned.
Serve sauce over spaghetti with grated Parmesan cheese.

recipes.title: Chicken Tikka Masala
recipes.description: A creamy and spicy Indian chicken curry.
steps: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices for 2 hours.
Add tomato puree and simmer for 10 minutes.
Add chicken pieces and cook until tender.
Stir in cream and garnish with fresh coriander.

recipes.title: Vegetable Stir Fry
recipes.description: A quick and healthy mix of stir-fried vegetables.
steps: Heat oil in a wok and sauté garlic and ginger.
Add vegetables and stir-fry for 5-7 minutes.
Pour soy sauce over the vegetables and toss well.
Serve hot as a side or main dish.

recipes.title: Pancakes
recipes.description: Fluffy breakfast pancakes that everyone will love.
steps: Whisk in milk and eggs until smooth.
Heat butter in a pan and pour batter to form pancakes.
then flip and cook the other side.

recipes.title: Beef Stroganoff
recipes.description: A creamy Russian dish with beef and mushrooms.
steps: Sauté onions and mushrooms in butter until soft.
Add beef and cook until browned.
then add sour cream and simmer for 10 minutes.

recipes.title: Chicken Alfredo
recipes.description: Creamy pasta with chicken in a white sauce.
steps: Cook pasta according to package instructions.
Sauté chicken pieces in butter until cooked through.
Mix in Parmesan cheese until melted.
Toss sauce with pasta and serve hot.

recipes.title: Lentil Soup
recipes.description: A hearty and nutritious soup with lentils and vegetables.
steps: then reduce heat and simmer until lentils are soft.

recipes.title: Caesar Salad
recipes.description: A fresh salad with crispy croutons and Caesar dressing.
steps: Add croutons and grated Parmesan cheese.
Serve chilled as a side or appetizer.

recipes.title: Chocolate Brownies
recipes.description: Rich and fudgy chocolate brownies.
steps: Whisk in sugar and eggs until smooth.
Fold in flour and mix well.
Pour batter into a baking dish and bake at 350°F for 25 minutes.

recipes.title: İskender Kebab
recipes.description: A beloved dish from Turkish cuisine, İskender Kebab combines layers of tender meat, buttery tomato sauce, and yogurt, served over pita bread.
ingredients: Ingredients:  For the Meat:  1.5 pounds of lamb or beef (thinly sliced or ground) 2 tablespoons of olive oil 1 teaspoon of salt 1 teaspoon of black pepper 1 teaspoon of paprika 1/2 teaspoon of cumin For the Tomato Sauce:  2 cups of ripe tomatoes (pureed or canned) 2 tablespoons of tomato paste 2 tablespoons of butter 1 teaspoon of sugar Salt to taste For the Yogurt Mixture:  1.5 cups of thick
plain Turkish yogurt (strained if needed) 1 clove of garlic (minced
optional) For the Base:  2 pieces of Turkish pide bread (or any flatbread
cubed) 2 tablespoons of butter (melted) For the Finishing:  2 tablespoons of melted butter (infused with paprika or chili powder for garnish) Fresh parsley (optional
steps: Prepare the Meat: If using sliced meat
and cumin for at least 1 hour. If using ground meat
mix the spices into the meat

and refrigerate. Cook the Meat: Heat a large skillet or grill pan over medium-high heat. Cook the marinated meat slices or patties until browned and cooked through. Keep warm. Make the Tomato Sauce: In a saucepan
melt the butter over medium heat. Add the tomato paste and cook for 1 minute. Stir in the pureed tomatoes

and salt. Simmer for 10-15 minutes until thickened. Prepare the Yogurt Mixture: Whisk the yogurt with the minced garlic (optional) until smooth. Set aside. Toast the Bread: Cube the flatbread into bite-sized pieces. Toss with melted butter and toast in the oven or a pan until golden and crispy. Assemble the Dish: On a large serving platter

spread the toasted bread cubes as the base. Spoon the hot tomato sauce over the bread to soak it. Arrange the cooked meat slices or patties on top. Add Yogurt and Butter: Drizzle the yogurt mixture over the meat. Pour melted butter infused with paprika or chili powder over the dish. Serve: Garnish with fresh parsley if desired. Serve immediately
while everything is hot and flavorful.

recipes.title: Baklava
recipes.description: A rich and sweet pastry made with layers of filo dough, nuts, and syrup.
steps: Layer filo dough with butter and nuts.

recipes.title: Pide
recipes.description: A Turkish flatbread with various toppings such as cheese, meat, or vegetables.
steps: Prepare dough and let it rise.
Shape into an oval and add toppings.
Bake in a hot oven until crust is golden.

recipes.title: Dolma
recipes.description: Grape leaves stuffed with a mixture of rice, spices, and sometimes meat.
steps: Cook in a pot with water and olive oil until tender.

recipes.title: Lahmacun
recipes.description: A thin Turkish flatbread topped with minced meat, vegetables, and spices.
steps: Prepare dough and roll out thinly.
Spread topping of minced meat and vegetables.
Bake in a hot oven for a few minutes.

recipes.title: Kebab Kubideh
recipes.description: Grilled skewers of seasoned ground meat, a popular dish in Azerbaijan.
steps: Mix ground meat with onion and spices.
Serve with rice and grilled vegetables.

recipes.title: Ash Plov
recipes.description: A traditional Azerbaijani rice dish cooked with dried fruits and meat.
steps: Sauté lamb and vegetables with dried fruits.

recipes.title: Künefe
recipes.description: A sweet Turkish dessert made with shredded filo dough, cheese, and syrup.
steps: Layer shredded filo dough with cheese and butter.
Pour syrup over hot dessert and serve warm.

recipes.title: Shashlik
recipes.description: Marinated meat skewers grilled over an open flame, a favorite in Azerbaijan.
steps: Skewer meat and grill over hot coals.
Serve with lavash bread and pickled vegetables.

recipes.title: Bozbash
recipes.description: A hearty Azerbaijani soup made with lamb, potatoes, and chickpeas.
steps: Simmer until flavors blend and serve hot.

recipes.title: Mantı
recipes.description: Small Turkish dumplings filled with meat and served with yogurt and garlic sauce.
steps: Prepare dough and roll out thinly.
Fill with minced meat and fold into small dumplings.
Boil dumplings and serve with yogurt and garlic sauce.
